name: One-time road
description:
In this VR game you drive a toy car along the road made of toilet paper. The road can be used only once because it's on fire, so hurry up and don't spend too much time off-road!

This short game is made for the VR jam 2022 in Unity.

I worked on it alone and this is my very first video-game! 🙌 

The game runs as an .apk for Meta Quest 2. I added PC VR support after the end of VR jam.

Things I used:

  • VR Interaction Framework
  • NWH Vehicle Physics 2
  • 7 Cars Pack
  • Road System (Barmetler)
  • Mirrors and reflections for VR
  • TinyFire VFX
  • Dissolve Edge Moonflower Carnivore
  • Paper Texture - https://pixabay.com/photos/paper-texture-scrapbooking-753508/
  • 3D models from "the base mesh" library https://thebasemesh.com/model-library
  • Fire sound https://freesound.org/people/tc630/sounds/47835/

                          🧻 
  🚗🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥
           🧻                           🧻

This game may feel difficult at first but it becomes more fun with every try.

⚠️ Don’t forget to set the “D” gear and accelerate quickly at the very beginning 😉
